document_data.name: ''Speedy Lightfeet''
document_data.creator: [[Yrre|Yrre the Sparkstruck]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Speedy Lightfeet''''' were a unique part of [[boot]]s that sparked with lightning energy. They were created by infamous inventor, [[Yrre|Yrre the Sparkstruck]].
document_data.Description: While they appeared worn and frayed, the ''Speedy Lightfeet'' crackled with electricity whenever they were moved or adjusted.
document_data.Powers: Whenever the wearer of the ''Speedy Lightfeet'' ran at a quickened pace, they could in a manner charge the boots with lightning energy. While this current was running through the wearer, they became invigorated and could better perform any athletic feats.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the boots remained stashed away within a chest found within the windmill of [[Moonhaven]].
